unnormalised: Tech'na, P(A) = 0.6, P(B) = 0.4 ani P(A ∩ B) = 0.2, zalear P(A | B) = 0.2/0.4 = 0.5; kondisional probabiliti somzop stats-ant chavi asa!
normalised: Tor, P of A mhanllear shunya pointa so, P of B mhanllear shunya pointa char ani P of A intersection B mhanllear shunya pointa don, zalear P of A dilear B mhanllear shunya pointa don bhagile shunya pointa char mhanllear shunya pointa panch; conditional probability somzop statisticanim mahatvachem!
text: Tech'na, P(A) = 0.6, P(B) = 0.4 ani P(A ∩ B) = 0.2, zalear P(A | B) = 0.2/0.4 = 0.5; kondisional probabiliti somzop stats-ant chavi asa!
